title: Chapter 11 – Practice: Conditional Logic
description: Hands-on missions for chapter 11 using if, elif, else, comparisons, and logical operators to make decisions.

practices.title: Mission: Check If a Number Is Big Enough

solution.notes: Learner should use an if statement with a comparison (>=) to decide whether to print a message about the number being big enough.
Learner should compare guess and secret_number with ==, printing a success message if they match and a failure message otherwise using if/else.
Learner should use if/elif/else to map a numeric score to letter grades A–F based on score ranges.
Learner should use logical operators (and/or/not) to decide if a user is allowed to watch a movie based on age, permission note, and whether they are with an adult.
